message.raw:
change skeleton loading to fix regressions

Skeleton is now loaded accordingly:
  - if the controller has a <skeleton> tag, use that as the skeleton roots
  - if not, use the whole scene as the root
  - animations may sometimes target "outside" the skeleton, if such an animation exists, add the targeted node to the skeleton nodes list
